parts.text: {"word":"riportare","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(物を)元の場所に戻す、持ち帰る","english_definition":"to bring something back to its original place; to return something","examples":[{"sentence":"Riporta questo libro alla biblioteca.","translation":"Return this book to the library."},{"sentence":"Devo riportare la macchina al concessionario.","translation":"I have to take the car back to the dealership."}],"synonyms":["restituire","riconsegnare"],"antonyms":["prendere","portare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人を)連れ戻す、帰還させる","english_definition":"to bring someone back; to return someone","examples":[{"sentence":"Riportami a casa, per favore.","translation":"Take me home, please."},{"sentence":"Spero di riportare i bambini sani e salvi.","translation":"I hope to bring the children back safe and sound."}],"synonyms":["accompagnare","ricondurre"],"antonyms":["lasciare","abbandonare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(情報・ニュースなどを)伝える、報告する","english_definition":"to report; to relate; to tell","examples":[{"sentence":"Il giornale ha riportato la notizia dell'incidente.","translation":"The newspaper reported the news of the accident."},{"sentence":"Riportami quello che ha detto.","translation":"Tell me what he said."}],"synonyms":["comunicare","riferire","annunciare"],"antonyms":["tacere","nascondere"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(言葉・発言などを)引用する、引き合いに出す","english_definition":"to quote; to cite","examples":[{"sentence":"Il giornalista ha riportato le parole del presidente.","translation":"The journalist quoted the president's words."},{"sentence":"Posso riportare un esempio dal libro?","translation":"Can I cite an example from the book?"}],"synonyms":["citare","riferirsi a"],"antonyms":["ignorare","tralasciare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(結果・利益などを)もたらす、生み出す","english_definition":"to bring about; to yield; to produce","examples":[{"sentence":"Questo investimento dovrebbe riportare buoni risultati.","translation":"This investment should yield good results."},{"sentence":"Il progetto ha riportato un grande successo.","translation":"The project brought great success."}],"synonyms":["produrre","generare","fruttare"],"antonyms":["perdere","danneggiare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(状態・状況などが)～に戻る、～に変わる","english_definition":"to return to; to revert to","examples":[{"sentence":"La situazione è riportata alla normalità.","translation":"The situation has returned to normal."},{"sentence":"Il prezzo è riportato al livello precedente.","translation":"The price has reverted to the previous level."}],"synonyms":["tornare","ritornare","ristabilire"],"antonyms":["allontanarsi","deviare"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from 'ri-' (again) + 'portare' (to carry).","priority":"medium"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ri.porˈta.re/","notes":"Stress on the third syllable (por)."},"inflection":{"forms":{"present_indicative":{"io":"riporto","tu":"riporti","lui/lei":"riporta","noi":"riportiamo","voi":"riportate","loro":"riportano"},"past_participle":"riportato","past_historic":{"io":"riportai","tu":"riportasti","lui/lei":"riportò","noi":"riportammo","voi":"riportaste","loro":"riportarono"},"imperfect_indicative":{"io":"riportavo","tu":"riportavi","lui/lei":"riportava","noi":"riportavamo","voi":"riportavate","loro":"riportavano"},"future_indicative":{"io":"riporterò","tu":"riporterai","lui/lei":"riporterà","noi":"riporteremo","voi":"riporterete","loro":"riporteranno"},"subjunctive":{"present":{"io":"riporti","tu":"riporti","lui/lei":"riporti","noi":"riportiamo","voi":"riportiate","loro":"riportino"},"imperfect":{"io":"riportassi","tu":"riportassi","lui/lei":"riportasse","noi":"riportassimo","voi":"riportaste","loro":"riportassero"}},"conditional":{"present":{"io":"riporterei","tu":"riporteresti","lui/lei":"riporterebbe","noi":"riporteremmo","voi":"riportereste","loro":"riporterebbero"}},"imperative":{"tu":"riporta","noi":"riportiamo","voi":"riportate"}}},"notes":"Regular -are verb conjugation."},"usage_notes":{"general":"'Riportare' is a versatile verb with several meanings, including returning objects, bringing people back, reporting information, quoting someone, and yielding results. The specific meaning depends on the context.","reporting":"When used in the context of reporting information, it's similar to 'riferire' and 'comunicare'.","returning":"When used in the context of returning something, it's similar to 'restituire' and 'riconsegnare'."},"common_mistakes":{"mistake1":{"description":"Confusing 'riportare' with 'portare'.","correct_form":"Remember that 'riportare' implies bringing something back to a previous location, while 'portare' simply means 'to carry'."}},"related_words":{"related_term1":{"term":"report","relationship":"English cognate"},"related_term2":{"term":"portare","relationship":"Related verb (to carry)"}},"level_frequency":{"level":"B1","frequency_score":"High"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Devo riportare le chiavi al proprietario.","translation":"I have to return the keys to the owner.","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Il testimone ha riportato i fatti alla polizia.","translation":"The witness reported the facts to the police.","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Questo investimento potrebbe riportare grandi profitti.","translation":"This investment could yield great profits.","type":"example"}]}
